com.nutiteq.datasources.raster

Class MBOnlineRasterDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.rasterdatasources.AbstractRasterDataSource
      • com.nutiteq.rasterdatasources.StreamRasterDataSource
        • com.nutiteq.rasterdatasources.HTTPRasterDataSource
          • com.nutiteq.datasources.raster.MBOnlineRasterDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UTFGridDataSource, com.nutiteq.rasterdatasources.RasterDataSource

    public class MBOnlineRasterDataSource
extends com.nutiteq.rasterdatasources.HTTPRasterDataSource
implements UTFGridDataSource
    A raster data source class for online MapBox data. It is mainly a basic HTTP raster data source but adds implementation for UTF grid data sources.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.nutiteq.rasterdatasources.RasterDataSource

    • Constructor Detail

      • MBOnlineRasterDataSource

        public MBOnlineRasterDataSource(com.nutiteq.projections.Projection projection,
                        int minZoom,
                        int maxZoom,
                        String account,
                        String map)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        projection - projection for the data source (practically always EPSG3857)
        minZoom - minimum zoom supported by the data source.
        maxZoom - maximum zoom supported by the data source.
        account - account id to use
        map - map id to use

    • Method Detail

      • loadUTFGrid

        public UtfGridHelper.MBTileUTFGrid loadUTFGrid(com.nutiteq.components.MapTile tile)
        Description copied from interface: UTFGridDataSource
        Load UTF grid data for given tile.
        Specified by:
        loadUTFGrid in interface UTFGridDataSource
        Parameters:
        tile - input tile
        Returns:
        UTF grid data for the tile or null if not available.
